data.name: Description
data.detail:
A vast, eel-like Bio-Titan able to harness bioel-
ectric energy. Rumoured to dwell at the deepest point of the world’s oceans within the Amara Trench in the Oceanic Rim.

data.name: Titanic Actions
data.detail:
Electrophorus can take three Titanic Actions, choosing from the options below. Only one Titanic Action may be chosen at a time and only at the end of another Pilot’s or NPC’s turn. Electrophorus regains spent Titanic Actions at the start of their turn.

• Electrophorus moves one Range Band.
• Electrophorus makes a Electrified Spines Attack.
• Electrophorus makes a Bio-Electric Arc Attack (Uses 2 Titanic Actions).

data.name: Electrified Spines
data.info: Turn Action // Range: Close // Damage: 8 SP // Melee // Ion
data.detail: Electrophorus gouges a target with its spines

data.name: Static Field
data.detail: Anything that starts its turn or enters within Close Range of the Electrophorus will take 5 SP damage.

data.name: Hover
data.detail: Electrophorus is able to use its bioelectric energy to hover over obstacles, creatures, Mechs, and terrain as a Free Action.

data.name: Bio-Electric Arc
data.detail: Electrophorus fires an arc of bioelectricity. Choose up to three targets in Medium Range and make a single attack roll. On a successful hit the first target takes 10 SP damage, the second target takes 5 SP damage, and the third target takes 3 SP damage.

data.name: Bio-Electric Shield
data.detail:
As a Reaction may when hit by an attack, Elec- trophorus may trigger its Bio-Electric Shield to deflect the blow.

*ROLL THE DIE:*
`20`: Electrophorus prevents the attack and can make a free Bio-Electric Arc attack against the attacker.
`10 - 19`: Electrophorus prevents the attack.
`6 - 10`: Electrophorus takes half damage from the attack.
`2 - 5`: The Shield fails and cannot be used until the end of Electrophorus’ next turn.
`1`: The Shield fails and is unusable for 24 hours.
